name: A Photo of Home
description:
You are a human. Living on a small island. with trees, birds, and weird things.

You're online friends with a vampire. Though physically distant, you share pictures of the things you find on your day to day travels.

This prototype was put  together as part of TasJam at Home

Controls:

WASD : Move
Return/Enter: Enter Camera mode
LMB: Take photo/Select Photo to upload/Progress through dialogue
Scrollwheel up/down: Adjust Camera FoV/Zoom
F2: Toggle External Photo saving (disabled by default)

- You can hold up to 9 photos at a time. The oldest photo is overwritten if this limit is exceeded. All photos are removed at the beginning of a new day.
- You can pick one photo per day to send to your friend.
- External Photo Saving places a copy of every photo you take to the folder the game is running in.
